data.title: Profiles: Bavarian Rulers and Consorts
data.meta_description: Kings of Bavaria and Their Consorts King Maximilian I Princess Auguste Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt Queen Karoline (Princess of Baden) King Ludwig I Queen Therese (Princess Saxe-Hildburghausen) Ki…
data.text:
Kings of Bavaria and Their Consorts

King Maximilian I

Princess Auguste Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt

Queen Karoline (Princess of Baden)

King Ludwig I

Queen Therese (Princess Saxe-Hildburghausen)

King Maximilian II

Queen Marie (Princess of Prussia)

King Ludwig II

King Otto

Luitpold, Prince Regent

Archduchess Augusta of Austria

Ludwig III

Queen Maria Theresa (Archduchess of Austria-Este)

Pretenders to the Throne

Crown Prince Rupprecht

Duchess Marie Gabrielle in Bavaria

Crown Princess Antonia

Albrecht, Duke of Bavaria

Franz, The Duke of Bavaria

King Maximilian I of Bavaria

Full Name: Maximilian Joseph

Titles: His Majesty The King of Bavaria

Born: May 27, 1756, Schwetzingen

Parents: Frederick Michael of Zweibrücken-Birkenfeld and Maria Francisca of Sulzbach

Married (1): September 30, 1785, in Darmstadt, to Princess Auguste Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt

Children:

– King Ludwig I of Bavaria(1786)

– Princess Augusta (1788)

– Princess Amalie (1790)

– Princess Caroline Auguste, Empress of Austria (1792)

– Prince Karl Theodor (1795)

Married (2): March 9, 1797, in Karlsruhe, to Princess Karoline of Baden

Children:

– Prince Maximilian Joseph (1800)

– Princess Elisabeth Ludovika, Queen of Prussia (1801)

– Princess Amalie Auguste, Queen of Saxony (1801)

– Princess Sophie, Archduchess of Austria (1805)

– Princess Maria Anna, Queen of Saxony (1805)

– Princess Ludovika, Duchess in Bavaria (1808)

– Princess Maximiliana (1810)

Reign: January 1, 1806 – October 13, 1825

Died: October 13, 1825, Munich

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Maximilian I Joseph, King of Bavaria

Princess Auguste Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt

Full Name: Marie Auguste Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt

Titles: Duchess of Zweibrücken

Born: April 14, 1765, Darmstadt

Parents: Prince Georg Wilhelm of Hesse-Darmstadt and Maria Louise of Leiningen-Faldenburg-Dagsburg

Married: September 30, 1785, in Darmstadt, to the future King Maximilian I

Children:

– King Ludwig I of Bavaria(1786)

– Princess Augusta (1788)

– Princess Amalie (1790)

– Princess Caroline Auguste, Empress of Austria(1792)

– Prince Karl Theodor (1795)

Died: March 30, 1796, Rohrbach

Burial Site: Schlosskirche, Darmstadt

Unofficial Royalty: Auguste Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt

Queen Karoline of Bavaria

Full Name: Friederike Karoline Wilhelmine of Baden

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Bavaria

Born: July 13, 1776

Parents: Hereditary Prince Charles Louis of Baden and Landgravine Amalie of Hesse-Darmstadt

Married: March 9, 1797, in Karlsruhe, to the future King Maximilian I

Children:

– Prince Maximilian Joseph (1800)

– Princess Elisabeth Ludovika, Queen of Prussia (1801)

– Princess Amalie Auguste, Queen of Saxony (1801)

– Princess Sophie, Archduchess of Austria (1805)

– Princess Maria Anna, Queen of Saxony (1805)

– Princess Ludovika, Duchess in Bavaria (1808)

– Princess Maximiliana (1810)

Died: November 13, 1841, Munich

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Caroline of Baden, Queen of Bavaria

King Ludwig I of Bavaria

Full Name: Ludwig Karl August

Titles: His Majesty The King of Bavaria

Born: August 15, 1786, Strasbourg

Parents: King Maximilian I and Princess Auguste Wilhelmine of Hesse-Darmstadt

Married: October 12, 1810, Theresienwiese, Munich, to Princess Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen

Children:

– King Maximilian II of Bavaria (1811)

– Princess Mathilde Karoline, Grand Duchess of Hesse and by Rhine (1813)

– King Otto of Greece (1815)

– Princess Theodelinde (1816)

– Prince Luitpold, Prince Regent of Bavaria (1821)

– Princess Adelgunde, Duchess of Modena (1823)

– Princess Hildegard, Archduchess of Austria (1825)

– Princess Alexandra (1826)

– Prince Adalbert (1828)

Reign: October 13 1825 – March 20 1848

Died: February 29 1868, Nice

Burial Site: St Boniface’s Abbey, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Ludwig I, King of Bavaria

Queen Therese of Bavaria

Full Name: Therese Charlotte Luise of Saxe-Hildburghausen

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Bavaria

Born: July 8, 1792, Seidingstadt, Saxe-Hildburghausen

Parents: Frederik, Duke of Saxe-Altenburg and Duchess Charlotte Georgine of Mecklenburg-Strelitz

Married: October 12, 1810, Theresienwiese, Munich, to King Ludwig I of Bavaria

Children:

– King Maximilian II of Bavaria (1811)

– Princess Mathilde Karoline, Grand Duchess of Hesse and by Rhine (1813)

– King Otto of Greece (1815)

– Princess Theodelinde (1816)

– Prince Luitpold, Prince Regent of Bavaria (1821)

– Princess Adelgunde, Duchess of Modena (1823)

– Princess Hildegard, Archduchess of Austria (1825)

– Princess Alexandra (1826)

– Prince Adalbert (1828)

Died: October 26, 1854, Munich

Burial Site: St Boniface’s Abbey, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen, Queen of Bavaria

King Maximilian II of Bavaria

Full Name: Maximilian Joseph

Titles: His Majesty The King of Bavaria

Born: November 28, 1811, Munich

Parents: Ludwig I of Bavaria and Princess Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen

Married: October 12, 1842, to Princess Marie of Prussia

Children:

– King Ludwig II of Bavaria(1846)

– King Otto of Bavaria (1848)

Reign: March 20, 1848 – March 10, 1864

Died: March 10, 1864, Munich

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Maximilian II, King of Bavaria

Queen Marie of Bavaria

Full Name: Marie Friederike Franziska Hedwig of Prussia

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Bavaria

Born: October 15, 1825, Stadtschloss, Berlin

Parents: Prince Wilhelm of Prussia and Princess Maria Anna of Hesse-Homburg

Married: October 12, 1842, to King Maximilian II of Bavaria

Children:

– King Ludwig II of Bavaria(1846)

– King Otto of Bavaria (1848)

Died: May 17, 1889, Hohenschwangau Castle

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Marie of Prussia, Queen of Bavaria

King Ludwig II of Bavaria

Full Name: Ludwig Otto Friedrich Wilhelm

Titles: His Majesty The King of Bavaria

Born: August 25, 1845, Nymphenburg Palace, Munich

Parents: Maximilian II of Bavaria and Princess Marie of Prussia

Reign: March 10, 1864 – June 13, 1886

Died: June 13, 1886, Lake Starnberg, Bavaria

Burial Site: St Michael’s Church, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Ludwig II, King of Bavaria

King Otto of Bavaria

Full Name: Otto Wilhelm Luitpold Adalbert Waldemar

Titles: His Majesty The King of Bavaria

Born: April 27, 1848, Munich Palace

Parents: Maximilian II of Bavaria and Princess Marie of Prussia

Reign: June 13, 1886 – November 5, 1913 (under Regency of his uncle and cousin)

Died: October 11, 1916, Fürstenried Palace, Munich

Burial Site: St Michael’s Church, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Otto I, King of Bavaria

Luitpold, Prince Regent of Bavaria

Full Name: Luitpold Karl Joseph Wilhelm Ludwig

Titles: His Royal Highness The Prince Regent

Born: March 12, 1821, Würzburg

Parents: Ludwig I of Bavaria and Princess Therese of Saxe-Hildburghausen

Married: April 1, 1844, in Florence, Italy, to Archduchess Augusta of Austria

Children:

– King Ludwig III of Bavaria (1845)

– Prince Leopold (1846)

– Princess Theresa (1850)

– Prince Arnulf (1852)

Regency: June 10, 1886 – December 12, 1912

Died: December 12, 1912, Munich

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Luitpold, Prince Regent of Bavaria

Archduchess Augusta of Austria, Princess of Bavaria

Full Name: Auguste Ferdinande

Titles: Archduchess Augusta of Austria, Princess of Bavaria

Born: April 1, 1825, Florence

Parents: Grand Duke Leopold II of Tuscany and Princess Maria Anna of Saxony

Married: April 1, 1844, in Florence, Italy, to Prince Luitpold of Bavaria

Children:

– King Ludwig III of Bavaria (1845)

– Prince Leopold (1846)

– Princess Theresa (1850)

– Prince Arnulf (1852)

Died: April 26, 1864, Munich

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Auguste of Austria, Princess of Bavaria

King Ludwig III of Bavaria

Full Name: Ludwig Luitpold Josef Maria Aloys Alfried

Titles: His Majesty The King of Bavaria

Born: January 7, 1845, Munich

Parents: Prince Luitpold of Bavaria and Archduchess Augusta of Austria

Married: February 20, 1868, at St Augustine’s Church in Vienna, to Princess Maria Theresia of Austria-Este

Children:

– Crown Prince Rupprecht (1869)

– Princess Adelgunde (1870)

– Princess Maria Ludwiga (1872)

– Prince Karl (1874)

– Prince Franz (1875)

– Princess Mathilde (1877)

– Prince Wolfgang (1879)

– Princess Hildegarde (1881)

– Princess Notburga (1883)

– Princess Wiltrud (1884)

– Princess Helmtrud (1886)

– Prince Dietlinde (1888)

– Prince Gundelinde (1891)

Reign: October 5, 1913 – November 7, 1918 (deposed)

Died: October 18, 1921, Nádasdy Castle, Sarvar, Hungary

Burial Site: Munich Frauenkirche (Cathedral of our Dear Lady), Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Ludwig III, King of Bavaria

Queen Maria Theresa of Bavaria

Full Name: Maria Theresia Henriette Dorothee of Austria-Este

Titles: Her Majesty The Queen of Bavaria

Born: July 2, 1849 at Brünn in Moravia (now Brno in the Czech Republic)

Parents: Francis IV, Duke of Modena and Princess Maria Beatrice of Savoy

Married: February 20, 1868, at St Augustine’s Church in Vienna, to King Ludwig III of Bavaria

Children:

– Crown Prince Rupprecht (1869)

– Princess Adelgunde (1870)

– Princess Maria Ludwiga (1872)

– Prince Karl (1874)

– Prince Franz (1875)

– Princess Mathilde (1877)

– Prince Wolfgang (1879)

– Princess Hildegarde (1881)

– Princess Notburga (1883)

– Princess Wiltrud (1884)

– Princess Helmtrud (1886)

– Prince Dietlinde (1888)

– Prince Gundelinde (1891)

Died: February 3, 1919, Wildenwart Castle, near Frasdorf

Burial Site: Munich Frauenkirche (Cathedral of our Dear Lady), Munich

Unofficial Royalty: Maria Theresia of Austria-Este, Queen of Bavaria

Crown Prince Rupprecht of Bavaria

Full Name: Rupprecht Maria Luitpold Ferdinand

Titles: His Royal Highness The Crown Prince of Bavaria, Duke of Bavaria, of Franconia and in Swabia, Count Palatine of the Rhine

Born: May 18, 1869, Munich

Parents: King Ludwig III of Bavaria and Archduchess Maria Theresia of Austria-Este

Married (1): July 10, 1900, in Munich, to Duchess Marie Gabrielle in Bavaria

Children:

– Luitpold, Hereditary Prince of Bavaria (1901)

– Princess Irmingard (1902)

– Albrecht, Duke of Bavaria (1905)

– Prince Rudolf (1909)

Married (2): April 7, 1921, in Lenggries, to Princess Antonia of Luxembourg

Children:

– Prince Heinrich Franz (1922)

– Princess Irmingard (1923)

– Princess Editha (1924)

– Princess Hilda (1926)

– Princess Gabrielle (1927)

– Princess Sophie (1935)

Died: August 2, 1955, Schloss Leutstetten, Starnberg

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Wikipedia: Crown Prince Rupprecht

Duchess Marie Gabrielle in Bavaria

Full Name: Marie Gabrielle Mathilde Isabelle Therese Antoinette Sabine

Titles: Her Royal Highness Princess Rupprecht of Bavaria, Duchess in Bavaria

Born: October 9, 1878, Tegernsee, Bavaria

Parents: Duke Karl-Theodor in Bavaria and Princess Maria José of Bragança

Married: July 10, 1900, in Munich, to Prince Rupprecht of Bavaria

Children:

– Luitpold, Hereditary Prince of Bavaria (1901)

– Princess Irmingard (1902)

– Albrecht, Duke of Bavaria (1905)

– Prince Rudolf (1909)

Died: October 24, 1912, Sorrento, Italy

Burial Site: Theatinerkirche, Munich

Wikipedia: Duchess Marie Gabrielle in Bavaria

Crown Princess Antonia of Bavaria

Full Name: Princess Antoinette Roberte Sophie Wilhelmine of Luxembourg

Titles: Her Royal Highness The Crown Princess of Bavaria

Born: October 7, 1899, Hohenburg Castle, Lenggries, Bavaria

Parents: Grand Duke Guillaume IV of Luxembourg and Princess Marie Anne of Portugal

Married: April 7, 1921, in Lenggries, to Crown Prince Rupprecht of Bavaria

Children:

– Prince Heinrich Franz (1922)

– Princess Irmingard (1923)

– Princess Editha (1924)

– Princess Hilda (1926)

– Princess Gabrielle (1927)

– Princess Sophie (1935)

Died: July 31, 1954, Lenzerheide, Switzerland

Burial Site: Santa Maria in Novicella, Rome

Wikipedia: Princess Antonia of Luxembourg

Albrecht, The Duke of Bavaria

Full Name: Albrecht Luitpold Ferdinand Michael

Titles: Albrecht, Duke of Bavaria, of Franconia and in Swabia, Count Palatine of the Rhine

Born: May 3, 1905, Munich

Parents: Rupprecht, Crown Prince of Bavaria and Duchess Marie Gabrielle in Bavaria

Married (1): September 3, 1930, to Countess Maria Draskovich of Trakostjan

Children:

– Princess Gabrielle Antonia (1931)

– Princess Charlotte Juliana (1931)

– Franz, Duke of Bavaria (1933)

– Prince Max-Emanuel, Duke in Bavaria (1937)

Married (2): April 21, 1971, to Countess Marie-Jenke Kegleich of Buzin

Died: July 8, 1996, Castle Berg, Starnberg

Burial Site: Wittelsbach cemetery, Andechs Abbey

Wikipedia: Albrecht, Duke of Bavaria

Franz, The Duke of Bavaria

Head of the House of Wittelsbach and Pretender to the Bavarian Throne

Full Name: Franz Bonaventura Adalbert Maria

Titles: Franz, Duke of Bavaria, of Franconia and in Swabia, Count Palatine of the Rhine

Born: July 14, 1933, Munich

Parents: Albrecht, Duke of Bavaria and Countess Maria Draskovich of Trakostjan

Pretender: since July 8, 1996, upon the death of his father
